title: Marli Taich, CPNP
bio:
Marli is a California native, growing up in Los Angeles and spending her college years at UCSD in sunny San Diego. She completed both her Bachelors in Nursing and her Masters in Advanced Practice Nursing at Columbia University School of Nursing in New York, graduating in May of 2017 and moving to Denver shortly thereafter. Marli was thrilled to begin working at Academy Park Pediatrics in the fall of 2017. She currently lives in the Highlands with her husband Zack and their heeler puppy Cassie, and in her spare time enjoys exploring new restaurants and skiing and hiking in the beautiful Colorado mountains.

> I aim to work collaboratively with parents to address the specific needs of their child so that they can thrive.

Marli is a Certified Pediatric Nurse Practitioner and an active member of the National Association of Pediatric Nurse Practitioners.
